IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Prepare students to understand and apply knowledge and skills in math, science and technology, and to work productively in a multicultural global environment. Student enrollment is approximately 950.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Prepare students to understand and apply knowledge and skills in math, science and technology, and to work productively in a multicultural global environment. Student enrollment is approximately 950.
IRS990.Desc: Program expenses include all costs necessary to operate the school.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 6a The school receives the bulk of its funding from the State of Colorado and is required to follow all state laws regarding education.
Policies are published in student and staff handbooks and on website. The School discloses its non-discriminations policies in the student and staff hand books.
Copies of Form 990 were distributed to Board Members for review and approval via email prior to filing.

Prospective Board Members are screened for potential conflicts of interest prior to appointment. Board Members are required to disclose conflicts of interest during Board meetings. Annual Conflict of Interest Statements are completed and reviewed by the Board and any discrepancies are reported to the Board President for resolution.
Compensation for officers and key employees was determined by the Board of Directors using comparative data and documented in the meeting minutes of the executive session.
Compensation for officers and key employees was determined by the Board of Directors using comparative data and documented in the meeting minutes of the executive session.
The organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public via its website and upon request.

Line 9. Changes during the year to Deferred Outflows of Resources, Liabilities, and Deferred Inflows of Resources related to pensions and post-employment benefits other than pensions (OPEB) resulted in a decrease in Net Assets. The changes decreased Net Assets by $1,523,196.
